welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Reinheim, Germany! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's charming atmosphere and discover its rich history, delicious cuisine, and stunning landscapes. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving primarily Lufthansa and Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving primarily non-Star Alliance international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Currently under construction and expected to open in 2023, this terminal will primarily serve low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
